faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about OCTsense technology and how it can benefit your practice.

questions.q: How accurate is OCTsense's AI analysis?
questions.a: OCTsense achieves over 95% accuracy in identifying common retinal pathologies such as CNV, DME, DRUSEN, or Normal cases. The AI model has been trained and validated with thousands of expert-annotated OCT images to ensure reliability in clinical support.

questions.q: Is OCTsense compliant with medical data regulations?
questions.a: Yes, OCTsense follows HIPAA compliance standards in the United States and adheres to GDPR requirements in Europe. All patient data is encrypted during transmission and storage, ensuring full data security and privacy protection.

questions.q: What types of diseases can OCTsense detect?
questions.a: OCTsense currently focuses on the automatic detection of CNV (Choroidal Neovascularization), DME (Diabetic Macular Edema), DRUSEN (Age-related Macular Degeneration markers), and Normal retinal tissue. Future versions may expand the diagnostic categories.

questions.q: Does OCTsense integrate with EMR or hospital systems?
questions.a: At this stage, OCTsense does not offer direct EMR integration. However, all analysis results and reports can be easily downloaded as standardized files, which can then be manually uploaded or attached into existing medical record systems.

questions.q: How does OCTsense handle training and support?
questions.a: We provide full onboarding guides, step-by-step tutorials, and unlimited support via email and chat. Our team ensures that each user can quickly learn to use OCTsense efficiently without the need for specialized technical knowledge.
